message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120.  It's in great condition and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you consider that?
